General.Name: Tus-Design Group Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Tus-Design Group Co., Ltd. offers engineering technical services in China. It provides engineering inspection, testing, construction, supervision, design, and other technical services. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Institute of Architectural Design Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tus-Design Group Co., Ltd. in March 2017. Tus-Design Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
